text: Her elegance, determination, and beauty made her coveted by all the heroes of the age.
Dong Min understands the unwritten rules of politics - one can never possess too much power.
No matter how brave the warrior, they cannot hope to match the power of her dignity and generosity.
Dong Peishan is greedy, but ever cautious in her conduct. If it’s Dong Zhou you’re after, you must outwit the cunning Dong Peishan first.
Jealous of Lady Feng’s preferential treatment and beauty, the concubines have made her cry in front of Yuan Shu numerous times.
As the leading general of the Kingdom of Zhong, Zhang Xun commands the formidable army of the Yuan family.
